The officials had served a notice to Sujana to appear before the Bangalore CBI on Friday in the matter.
title: Hyderabad: CBI issues notice to Sujana Chowdary

text: In Shivpuri, Madhya Pradesh, BJP MP Nand Kumar Singh attacked toll plaza staff for allegedly asking for ID cards.
title: BJP MP attacked

text: At Hukumpeta in Visakhapatnam district, the police seized 500 kg of ganja while it was being transported in a jeep. Three persons carrying ganja were arrested while two others are absconding.
title: Visakhapatnam: 500 kg ganja seized in jeep, three arrested
